name: SmartHeart
0:
”Alexa open Smart Heart”
”Alexa start Smart Heart”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart heart
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Smart Heart project explores the potential of delivering an individualised training routine through a Virtual assistant, Alexa, for enhancing the clinical and self-management of heart failure. The combination of state-of-the-art sensing technologies including physiological (e.g., blood pressure, weight, heart rate), behavioural (e.g., wearable activity trackers) and communication data allows building dynamic, adaptive and instantly available content. 
The self-management program is created through a web interface and then it is delivered through a browser on a computer or an Alexa-enabled device. The routine includes audio, images and videos. The content is optimized for Echo Show devices with a rectangular screen: Show 5, Echo Show 8, Echo Show 10, etc.
The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Smart Heart" or "Alexa, open Smart Heart" .
At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop" or "Alexa, exit"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
